forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 66. West wind 7 to 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of this early hour, Downtown San Francisco holds a quiet promise beneath a clement night sky. With temperatures resting gently around the low fiftys, the evening provides a refreshing palette: mostly clear, kissed by a light west-southwest breeze. As dawn approaches, one can sense the transformation that will soon unfold—a transition from this serene backdrop to a sunny, invigorating day almost destined for exploration.

Sunday spreads its canvas wide, offering sunshine that sweeps across the city, hinting at idyllic temperatures nearing sixty-six. One may imagine a leisurely morning stroll along the waterfront, where the fresh, salty air invigorates the senses. The clarity of the day suggests a dominance of light with little sign of fog or marine layer to disrupt the view, making it an ideal time for a moderate hike in the nearby hills or a visit to one of the charming outdoor cafés lining the streets. Dress lightly; layers would be wise against the wind that, while gentle this early, may strengthen as the sun climbs higher. Attire that whispers of comfort—perhaps a light jacket or a long-sleeve shirt paired with breathable fabrics—will suit the day well, keeping one stylish yet relaxed in this vibrant city.
